issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KS-iPad > Open Main Tests
2. Click Show List 
3. Select popovers
4. Click Show Popover 1
5. Click the text search area to invoke the keyboard
6. Rotate the device to landscape
7. Rotate the device to portrait

Actual:
The search area is gone after step 6 (see pic)
The popover changed form after step 7 (see pic)

Expected:
The popover should not change

Note:
Does not occur on ipad 2 4.3
fields.summary: iOS: Popover - iOS 5.0 only, when keyboard is invoked rotating causes the popover to change form
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 1.0.9.201202141208
SDK: 1.8.2.v20120223174636
Device: iPad 5.0.1 and iPad 2 5.0.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
